channel.title: Games on Souhrud's Website
channel.description: Recent content in Games on Souhrud's Website

item.title: Super Mario 64 - ps2 (Fork)
item.description: This project aims to port Super Mario 64 to the PlayStation 2, after it was decompiled. For a while, it refused to work on recent sdk versions on real hardware, despite improving performance. Made a few tweaks as suggested by @metchebe and @xdccrlz here and maintained it for a while. Also made a helper script to package it into an iso for easy OpenPS2Loader use! The upstream repo seems to have fixed this issue, but when I tried it, my save got wiped :(
